subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A bit of validation
author: Mvanah Maloti
full_text:
--0-392135297-1292962533=:29024
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hey, hey, hey!
=C2=A0
I don't think you're ignorant at all, Frank. Don't sa=
y those things.=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
Not that it matters, but you're not in any =
danger of pissing me off with this stuff. I love what you have to say about=
 these things, I enjoy the dialogue immensely=C2=A0and I listen closely whe=
n you speak. I think you have a very good, solid=C2=A0grasp when it comes t=
o the boxes and who/what we're communicating with, what's likely to be goin=
g on here=C2=A0and what their abilities and=C2=A0limitations may be. I come=
 here to learn from you (and others)=C2=A0and to consider all of the angles=
 in my attempt to further my own experience and understanding=C2=A0about th=
is stuff. 
=C2=A0
At the end of the day, my guess is NOT as good as yours i=
s, Frank. At least not at this point. 
=C2=A0
You're probably right about t=
he ET's and I like to think in terms of levels and layers as well. For the =
most part I think the boxes are tuning into a very close spiritual level/la=
yer/dimension=C2=A0and that=C2=A0SOME ("some") of it turns out to be astral=
 junk and low-level entities maquerading as something they're not. 
=C2=A0
=
(Come to think of it, maybe it's not so different over there, lol!). 
=C2=
=A0
That said, I know we can "tune into" and access all sorts of these=C2=
=A0dimensions and levels of consciousness and the=C2=A0intelligent beings t=
hat reside there=C2=A0with our=C2=A0sweeping radios. I think we've both had=
 the experience of speaking to loved ones who crossed over as well as=C2=A0=
ET's, angels, spirit guides and even plants, animals, the mineral kingdom=
=C2=A0and LIVING PEOPLE at times too. I'm sure others have had=C2=A0these k=
inds of sessions=C2=A0as well and I love hearing about our different experi=
ences and thoughts on the subject. 
=C2=A0
Part of my own work and meditati=
ons with the boxes=C2=A0reflect my own=C2=A0repeated attempts to reach a hi=
gher level of intelligent being, a finer-faster energy and more refined con=
sciousness during my sessions and recordings. I recognize it immediately wh=
en one of the "dark dorks" or low-level beings creeps through...for me it's=
 still very much a "hit or miss" kinda deal and I'm learning more all the t=
ime regarding how=C2=A0to increase my positive results and consistency of g=
ood information coming through the boxes. =C2=A0
=C2=A0
I've had several st=
rong experiences with the boxes and messages that may=C2=A0indicate or hint=
 at=C2=A0something about to happen and then it did, but for me it's usually=
 a few days or even a few weeks off (though there have been cases when what=
 they said would happen DID happen almost immediately - the plane crash I s=
poke about a few weeks ago was one of them).=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
It's really hard=
 for me=C2=A0to say much more than "I don't know" at this point, which is w=
hy I take what you and the other members=C2=A0share here and consider it al=
ong with everything else. It's very helpful and I appreciate what you have =
to say, Frank. 
=C2=A0
I totally agree with you=C2=A0in that I also=C2=A0fe=
el=C2=A0like ET's=C2=A0being such Highly Evolved Beings (or "HEB's" as I li=
ke to call them) are more likely to have a better grasp on the whole time-s=
pace issue=C2=A0as we know and experience it while living on this planet.=
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
There have been=C2=A0sessions when I've asked the discarnate=
=C2=A0voices how long ago they passed or how old they are/were or what day =
it is "over there" and many times=C2=A0they seem unable to answer, hesitant=
 at times, confused at=C2=A0others=C2=A0and often=C2=A0completely un-aware =
(or possibly just=C2=A0un-interested) when it comes to questions about thei=
r sense of time and how they experience and comprehend such a thing.
=C2=A0=

For the most part I've quit asking questions altogether and use my time wi=
th the boxes to just listen for whatever they feel like addressing during t=
he session and recording. 
=C2=A0
Thanks for that!=C2=A0 :) :) :) 
=C2=A0
I=
'll end by saying I find these conversations of great value and importance =
and I learn something new from you and the other members here every single =
day. It's all great food for thought and exactly the type of dialogue that =
needs to take place if we're ever going to get closer to the truth and a re=
al understanding of what's going on here. 
=C2=A0
I appreciate ya. 
=C2=A0
=
Grateful, 
Jerome
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0


--- On Tue, 12/21/10, Frank=
 Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <purple=

-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, December 21, 2010, 11:53 AM


=C2=A0 

=



=C2=A0I don't know, maybe it's just the different level that come throug=
h. I don't want to like lay down what's what, or try to be an authority. I =
don't know how this stuyff works, and I've pissed off enough people iun the=
 process. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0My guys know what I'll see and hear in the near fut=
ure, and often feed it to me ahaed of time, sometimes seconds, sometimes da=
y and hours, just=C2=A0to show. So everything I say is just my own experein=
ce. Maybe ET has broader vision? They seem to quite aware of what time it i=
s, and how much is left. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Ya have to keep in mind, I'm not edu=
cated, and not well traveled that=3D=3D=3Dignorance. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S


On=
 Tue, Dec 21, 2010 at 9:27 AM, Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...> wrote:


=
=C2=A0 








Perhaps so, and=C2=A0I would certainly like to=C2=A0believe=
 that, but it hasn't been my experience so far. That said, I've still got a=
 long ways to go and I respect that you've been at this for a lot longer th=
an I have, Frank. 
=C2=A0
For me their timelines are usually a bit skeewomp=
ous, doesn't mean that's the way it is for all of=C2=A0them necessarily. Li=
ke I said, I dunno, but I'm trying to find out.=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
Best, 
J
=
=C2=A0


--- On Tue, 12/21/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> w=
rote:

side are very much aware of time, who when and what they are communicating =
with here. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
F-S

On Mon, Dec 20, 2010 at 5:01 PM, Mvanah Malo=
ti <inyanga4@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 








Just my two cents and inpu=
t based=C2=A0on what I get from my ancestral guides and guardians...
=C2=A0=

The spiritual dimension and those who reside there=C2=A0do not=C2=A0percei=
ve "time" as we do in=C2=A0the typical=C2=A0linear fashion. Remember the sa=
ying, "In the twinkling of an eye?"
=C2=A0
10,000 years here may only seem =
like a few precious moments over=C2=A0there, and vice versa. 
=C2=A0
They a=
lso remind me of the quantum field, string theory, our=C2=A0holographic Uni=
verse (etc)=C2=A0and that ALL time is "ticking" (past, present=C2=A0& futur=
e) at the very same moment. It's all happening=C2=A0RIGHT=C2=A0NOW in vario=
us levels, layers, alternative realities and spiritual/energetic dimensions=
.
=C2=A0
The end of the Earth has already happened (for them and us!) in ma=
ny ways. Depending on who you're speaking=C2=A0to, some even describe what =
it was like when=C2=A0the planet Earth was destroyed, speaking as though it=
 has/had already occured.=C2=A0There would also be dimensions in which this=
 event has already occured thousands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days fr=
om now and 10,000 years into the future and every other possible scenario. =

=C2=A0
So which one is the RIGHT one then? 
=C2=A0
Well, I think they all =
are. 
=C2=A0
Because "they" live in a world of "source energy", light, cons=
ciousness and perfect=C2=A0information fields...one that's=C2=A0so complete=
ly and totally different to our own experience here/now=C2=A0and are=C2=A0n=
ot limited by linear time and local/non-local space=C2=A0or relativity like=
 we are, it's likely very difficult for most of the beings we would speak t=
o through the box to give us specific information regarding such an event o=
r the exact time (or even "which Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally=
 speaking!). 
=C2=A0
In other words, they don't experience any of this stuf=
f (and especially=C2=A0"time") like we do. =C2=A0
=C2=A0
To end,=C2=A0for s=
everal years=C2=A0now I've been=C2=A0a devoted care-giver to the ancient qu=
artz=C2=A0crystal skulls=C2=A0of Mayan legend=C2=A0and much of the mytholog=
ies and folklore surrounding these objects is focused around 2012 and the i=
mpending=C2=A0Great Shift. I've also=C2=A0studied South American culture (p=
ast and present), anthropology,=C2=A0folklore=C2=A0and tribal customs along=
 with=C2=A0their indigenous wisdom systems in=C2=A0varying=C2=A0depth with =
the Kogi Indians, Quechua Curanderos and residents of the Amazon. 
=C2=A0
F=
or many years I followed the work of Terence McKenna=C2=A0rather closely an=
d Terence is someone I consider a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he =
rest in peace). He developed a time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, th=
e Mayan Calendar, Great Pyramids, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness=
=C2=A0and other mathematic systems=C2=A0that showed a sharp spike followed =
by a near-perfect "dip" before it went off the charts and moved into "nothi=
ngness" completely around December 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't thi=
nk this is when the world would end, necessarily. 
=C2=A0
(His "official" p=
osition is that he simply didn't know what to make of it or expect. One the=
ory is that his algorithms reflected such a change during a time=C2=A0that =
humanity may have finally broken the time/space barrier and uncovered the k=
eys to time travel and 4th dimensional plane-shifting, to name just one pos=
sible solution.). =C2=A0
=C2=A0
I've also been fortunate enough to live in =
Swaziland, South Africa with the Swazi, Zulu, Xhosa=C2=A0and San Bushmen tr=
ibes who (like most other cultures throughout time and history)=C2=A0also h=
ave their own teachings and mystery traditions surrounding
this and other e=
vents. 
=C2=A0
Given that the San are the most ancient tribal peoples and h=
umanities oldest ancestors still living in the world today and whose incred=
ible healing knowledge, spiritual wisdoms and mystical practices far exceed=
 any I've ever heard of or personally witnessed anywhere else in the world =
and they don't seem to feel that life on this=C2=A0planet=C2=A0is going to =
end anytime soon, so I'm not going to panic just yet. 
=C2=A0
These amazing=
 people have their ears pressed up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythm=
s of Mother Earth and told me firsthand that before the end comes certain e=
vents will take place on a scale the whole world will be instantly made awa=
re of...events that could still take several hundred or even thousands of y=
ears to unfold.
=C2=A0
All I know for my own self, personally, is that I ha=
ve no clue what's going to happen...but it will be okay, no matter what tak=
es place. There are worst things than dying, believe me...and part of what =
makes our work with the Ghost Box and ITC in general so helpful and inspiri=
ng is that we can find a level of peace and comfort through our sessions an=
d recordings we might actually need one day, whether soon or in some distan=
t time - we're all going to end up there eventually, no doubt about it! 
=
=C2=A0
FINAL NOTE: I don't have all the answers...I don't even have all the=
 questions, and I know it. My guess is as good as any and I could be comple=
tely and totally WRONG about all of this (I'm open to that and=C2=A0I'm per=
fectly fine with it). Believe you me, if the world ends when a lot of=C2=A0=
folks think it might I'll be just as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll k=
eep doing what I do now; realizing that I don't know a damn thing, taking l=
ife as it comes to me day by precious=C2=A0day, treating it with respect an=
d honoring=C2=A0my experience here=C2=A0as the gift it is, loving others, b=
eing good to the people around me=C2=A0and enjoying my family and time spen=
t here while I can. 
=C2=A0
And I won't be afraid...not even for one second=
 or when I'm looking up and seeing that big f***ing rock heading right towa=
rds us, hahaha. For all I know (or anyone here for that matter), I could be=
 blindsided by a Mac truck later this evening! 
=C2=A0
Many of the people w=
orried over 2012 won't even be here when 2012 arrives...now how's THAT for =
a mind-f**k!?!?
=C2=A0
;)
=C2=A0
-J
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

<table cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0" border=3D"0" ><tr><td valign=3D"=
top" style=3D"font: inherit;"><DIV><EM>Hey, hey, hey!</EM></DIV>
<DIV>&nbsp=
;</DIV>
<DIV>I don't think you're ignorant at all, Frank. Don't say those t=
hings.  ;)</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Not that it matters, but you'r=
e not in any danger of pissing me off with this stuff. I love what you have=
 to say about these things, I enjoy the dialogue immensely and I liste=
n closely when you speak. I think you have a very good, solid grasp wh=
en it comes to the boxes and who/what we're communicating with, what's like=
ly to be going on here and what their abilities and limitations m=
ay be. I come here to learn from you (and others) and to consider all =
of the angles in my attempt to further my own experience and understanding&=
nbsp;about this stuff. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>At the end of the day,=
 my guess is <STRONG><U>NOT</U></STRONG> as good as yours is, Frank. At lea=
st not at this point. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>You're probably right a=
bout the ET's and I like to think in terms of levels and layers as well. Fo=
r the most part I think the boxes are tuning into a very close spiritual le=
vel/layer/dimension and that SOME ("some") of it turns out to be =
astral junk and low-level entities maquerading as something they're not. </=
DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>(Come to think of it, maybe it's <STRONG><U>not=
</U></STRONG> so different over there, lol!). </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV=
>That said, I know we can "tune into" and access all sorts of these di=
mensions and levels of consciousness and the intelligent beings that r=
eside there with our sweeping radios. I think we've both had the =
experience of speaking to loved ones who crossed over as well as ET's,=
 angels, spirit guides and even plants, animals, the mineral kingdom a=
nd LIVING PEOPLE at times too. I'm sure others have had these kinds of=
 sessions as well and I love hearing about our different experiences a=
nd thoughts on the subject. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Part of my own wo=
rk and meditations with the boxes reflect my own repeated attempt=
s to reach a higher level of intelligent being, a finer-faster energy and m=
ore refined consciousness during my sessions and recordings. I recognize it=
 immediately when one of the "dark dorks" or low-level beings creeps throug=
h...for me it's still very much a "hit or miss" kinda deal and I'm learning=
 more all the time regarding how to increase my positive results and c=
onsistency of good information coming through the boxes.  </DIV>
<DIV>=
 </DIV>
<DIV>I've had several strong experiences with the boxes and me=
ssages that may indicate or hint at something about to happen and=
 then it did, but for me it's usually a few days or even a few weeks off (t=
hough there have been cases when what they said would happen DID happen alm=
ost immediately - the plane crash I spoke about a few weeks ago was one of =
them).  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>It's really hard for me to =
say much more than <EM>"I don't know"</EM> at this point, which is why I ta=
ke what you and the other members share here and consider it along wit=
h everything else. It's very helpful and I appreciate what you have to say,=
 Frank. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I totally agree with you in that=
 I also feel like ET's being such <STRONG>H</STRONG>ighly <S=
TRONG>E</STRONG>volved <STRONG>B</STRONG>eings (or "HEB's" as I like to cal=
l them) are more likely to have a better grasp on the whole time-space issu=
e as we know and experience it while living on this planet. </DIV=
>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>There have been sessions when I've asked the =
discarnate voices how long ago they passed or how old they are/were or=
 what day it is "over there" and many times they seem unable to answer=
, hesitant at times, confused at others and often completely=
 un-aware (or possibly just un-interested) when it comes to questions =
about their sense of time and how they experience and comprehend such a thi=
ng.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For the most part I've quit asking questio=
ns altogether and use my time with the boxes to just listen for whatever th=
ey feel like addressing during the session and recording. </DIV>
<DIV>&nbsp=
;</DIV>
<DIV>Thanks for that!  :) :) :) </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>=
I'll end by saying I find these conversations of great value and importance=
 and I learn something new from you and the other members here every single=
 day. It's all great food for thought and exactly the type of dialogue that=
 needs to take place if we're ever going to get closer to the truth and a r=
eal understanding of what's going on here. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I =
appreciate ya. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Grateful, </DIV>
<DIV>Jerome</=
DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV=
>

<TD vAlign=3Dtop>
<DIV>Perhaps so, and I would certainly like t=
o believe that, but it hasn't been my experience so far. That said, I'=
ve still got a long ways to go and I respect that you've been at this for a=
 lot longer than I have, Frank. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For me their =
timelines are usually a bit skeewompous, doesn't mean that's the way it is =

<DIV> I think those on the otherside are v=
ery much aware of time, who when and what they are communicating with here.=
 </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>F-S<BR></DIV>
<DIV>On Mon,=
 Dec 20, 2010 at 5:01 PM, Mvanah Maloti <SPAN dir=3Dltr><<A href=3D"http=
://us.mc1110.mail.yahoo.com/mc/compose?to=3Dinyanga4@..." rel=3Dnofol=

<BLOCKQUOT=
E style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: #ccc 1px solid">

ing=3D0 cellPadding=3D0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>
<DIV>Just my two ce=
nts and input based on what I get from my ancestral guides and guardia=
ns...</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The spiritual dimension and those who re=
side there do not perceive "time" as we do in the typical&nb=
sp;linear fashion. Remember the saying, <EM>"In the twinkling of an eye?"</=
EM></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>10,000 years here may only seem like a few=
 precious moments over there, and vice versa. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>=

<DIV>They also remind me of the quantum field, string theory, our hol=
ographic Universe (etc) and that <EM><U>ALL time is "ticking"</U></EM>=
 (past, present & future) at the very same moment. It's all happen=
ing RIGHT NOW in various levels, layers, alternative realities an=
d spiritual/energetic dimensions.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The end of t=
he Earth has already happened (for them and us!) in many ways. Depending on=
 who you're speaking to, some even describe <EM>what it was like</EM> =
when the planet Earth was destroyed, speaking as though it has/had alr=
eady occured. There would also be dimensions in which this event has a=
lready occured thousands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days from now and 1=
0,000 years into the future and every other possible scenario. </DIV>
<DIV>=
 </DIV>
<DIV>So which one is the RIGHT one then? </DIV>
<DIV> </D=
IV>
<DIV>Well, I think they all are. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Because =
"they" live in a world of "source energy", light, consciousness and perfect=
 information fields...one that's so completely and totally differ=
ent to our own experience here/now and are not limited by linear =
time and local/non-local space or relativity like we are, it's likely =
very difficult for most of the beings we would speak to through the box to =
give us specific information regarding such an event or the exact time (or =
even "which Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally speaking!). </DIV>
<=
DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>In other words, they don't experience any of this stu=
ff (and especially "time") like we do.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
=
<DIV>To end, for several years now I've been a devoted care-=
giver to the ancient quartz crystal skulls of Mayan legend a=
nd much of the mythologies and folklore surrounding these objects is focuse=
d around 2012 and the impending Great Shift. I've also studied So=
uth American culture (past and present), anthropology, folklore a=
nd tribal customs along with their indigenous wisdom systems in v=
arying depth with the Kogi Indians, Quechua Curanderos and residents o=
f the Amazon. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For many years I followed the w=
ork of Terence McKenna rather closely and Terence is someone I conside=
r a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he rest in peace). He developed a=
 time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, the Mayan Calendar, Great Pyrami=
ds, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness and other mathematic sys=
tems that showed a sharp spike followed by a near-perfect "dip" before=
 it went off the charts and moved into "nothingness" completely around Dece=
mber 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't think this is when the world woul=
d end, necessarily. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>(His "official" position =
is that he simply didn't know what to make of it or expect. One theory is t=
hat his algorithms reflected such a change during a time that humanity=
 may have finally broken the time/space barrier and uncovered the keys to t=
ime travel and 4th dimensional plane-shifting, to name just one possible so=
lution.).  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I've also been fortunate enou=
gh to live in Swaziland, South Africa with the Swazi, Zulu, Xhosa and =
San Bushmen tribes who (like most other cultures throughout time and histor=
y) also have their own teachings and mystery traditions surrounding<BR=
>this and other events. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Given that the San ar=
e the most ancient tribal peoples and humanities oldest ancestors still liv=
ing in the world today and whose incredible healing knowledge, spiritual wi=
sdoms and mystical practices far exceed any I've ever heard of or personall=
y witnessed anywhere else in the world and they don't seem to feel that lif=
e on this planet is going to end anytime soon, so I'm not going t=
o panic just yet. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>These amazing people have t=
heir ears pressed up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythms of Mother Ea=
rth and told me firsthand that before the end comes certain events will tak=
e place on a scale the whole world will be instantly made aware of...events=
 that could still take several hundred or even thousands of years to unfold=
.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>All I know for my own self, personally, is t=
hat I have no clue what's going to happen...but it will be okay, no matter =
what takes place. There are worst things than dying, believe me...and part =
of what makes our work with the Ghost Box and ITC in general so helpful and=
 inspiring is that we can find a level of peace and comfort through our ses=
sions and recordings we might actually need one day, whether soon or in som=
e distant time - we're all going to end up there eventually, no doubt about=
 it! </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><STRONG>FINAL NOTE:</STRONG> I don't hav=
e all the answers...I don't even have all the questions, and I know it. My =
guess is as good as any and I could be completely and totally WRONG about a=
ll of this (I'm open to that and I'm perfectly fine with it). Believe =
you me, if the world ends when a lot of folks think it might I'll be j=
ust as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll keep doing what I do now; reali=
zing that I don't know a damn thing, taking life as it comes to me day by p=
recious day, treating it with respect and honoring my experience =
here as the gift it is, loving others, being good to the people around=
 me and enjoying my family and time spent here while I can. </DIV>
<DI=
V> </DIV>
<DIV>And I won't be afraid...not even for one second or when=
 I'm looking up and seeing that big f***ing rock heading right towards us, =
hahaha. For all I know (or anyone here for that matter), I could be blindsi=
ded by a Mac truck later this evening! </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Many o=
f the people worried over 2012 won't even be here when 2012 arrives...now h=
ow's THAT for a mind-f**k!?!?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>;)</DIV>
<DIV>&n=
bsp;</DIV>
<DIV>-J</DIV>
